contest-event.event-date:
June 13, 1971 D Buxton Festival (Section B)
Buxton Festival (Section B) 102 Test Piece Contest Buxton Festival buxton-festival-section-b
Octagon Theatre, Pavilion Gardens, Buxton Choice of Mexican Fiesta or Snowdon Fantasy - bands drawn 3,4 and 5 played Mexican Fiesta the remainder played Snowdon Fantasy. Prizes - 1st £40 abd trophy, 2nd £25 and trophy, 3rd £12. 10 bands competed.
Nov. 5, 2015, 7:05 p.m. March 23, 2020, 10:29 a.m.
1 Milnrow Band T. Lawson
2 Hatfield Band A. Dinning
3 Greenalls Band Charles Fradley
4 Gresley Colliery Band Albert Lunn
Unknown Result Dobcross Silver Band Derek Broadbent
Unknown Result Marsden Silver Prize Band John Harrison
Unknown Result Peak Dale Public B. Webb
Unknown Result Foresters Brass Peter Thompson
Unknown Result Emley Brass Band Charlie Westerby
Unknown Result B. M. & W. Band R. J. Webster
